skins.shipDescription: The 11th Destroyer of Kagerou class ¡ª Urakaze
skins.selfIntroduction: The 17th Destroyer fleet have been together for most of the time, and we participated in all sorts of sorties and operations for almost the entirety of the war. In the end I was with Kongou-sama as we both made our last stand¡­ to the end. So I don¡¯t care about those little things.
skins.acquisition: So it turns out to be you, are you the Commander of the 17th Destroyer fleet from today onwards? You seem so ordinary. I am Kagerou class Urakaze, show me what you got, Commander.
skins.login: So slow, are you like a turtle who¡¯s stumbled onto the battlefield?
skins.details: O you mean this family emblem? I designed this myself, plus the clothes. I won¡¯t accept any other comments except for ¡°its cute¡±.
skins.secretaryIdle1: That Hamakaze girl, as my little sister she always acts superior to Tanikaze, even more than I do, darn¡­
skins.secretaryIdle2: If only we discovered Tusk, then Kongou-sama would not¡­ sigh, forget it, what¡¯s important is the present
skins.secretaryIdle3: Official documents? Let me see¡­ hmm¡­ ahh I see I see...
skins.secretaryTouch: Don¡¯t poke me unstoppingly, are you a monkey?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: This type of things should not be tolerated, right? In that case, die...

skins.shipDescription: Before you raise a fuss about it, let me just tell you this - the concept of "Christmas" already existed during the Sengoku period, so there's nothing weird about putting on a Christmas outfit!
skins.acquisition: Before you raise a fuss about it, let me just tell you this - the concept of "Christmas" already existed during the Sengoku period, so there's nothing weird about putting on a Christmas outfit!
skins.login: Merry Christmas. I suppose I'll let you take it easy today.
skins.details: You should know that I designed this outfit just by seeing the family crest here. Do you think it looks good?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Isokaze, stop frolicking around like a little kid, and don't pull on me either! Ugh... what am I going to do with you?
skins.secretaryIdle2: I still have to prepare presents for the three stooges... Jeez, can't they be a bit more considerate towards their big sis normally? Oh well, I suppose that's how it should be.
skins.secretaryIdle3: It's snowing... Hmm? It's not like I particularly want to play in the snow or anything, but if you want to so badly, I suppose I can tag along.
skins.secretaryTouch: Santa Claus? ... Hmph, I graduated from that fairy tale long ago.
